from email.utils import formataddr
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 event = portal.restrictedTraverse(event_relative_url)
 
 subject = event.getTitle()
 body = event.getTextContent()
 sender = event.getSourceValue()
 if kw.get("from_url") is not None:
 from_url = kw.get("from_url")
 elif sender is not None:
 from_url = formataddr((sender.getTitle(), sender.getDefaultEmailText()))
 else:
 from_url = portal.portal_preferences.getPreferredEventSenderEmail()
 
 attachment_list = kw.pop('attachment_list', [])
 
 to_url = formataddr((context.getTitle(), context.getDefaultEmailText()))
 
 document_type_list = list(event.getPortalEmbeddedDocumentTypeList()) + list(event.getPortalDocumentTypeList())
 embedded_file_list = event.getAggregateValueList(portal_type=document_type_list)
 
 content_type = event.getContentType()
 mail_message = portal.Base_createMailMessageAsString(from_url,
 to_url,
 subject,
 body,
 content_type,
 attachment_list=attachment_list,
 embedded_file_list=embedded_file_list)
 
 event.sendMailHostMessage(mail_message)
 
 if not event.hasData():
 # Store the content of the email as data, so that we can keep a reference to
 # the email that was actually sent.
 # XXX this has no meaning in the case of an email with multiple recipents.
 if len(embedded_file_list):
 # do not store aggregated documents in Email document
 # to avoid duplicate data
 tmp_mail_message = context.Base_createMailMessageAsString(from_url,
 to_url,
 subject,
 body,
 content_type,
 attachment_list=attachment_list)
 event.setData(tmp_mail_message)
 else:
 event.setData(mail_message)
